entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -37.9°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
